name: io.github.pagerduty/pagerduty-mcp
description: PagerDuty's official MCP server which provides tools to interact with your PagerDuty account.

headers.name: Authorization
headers.description: PagerDuty User API Token - obtain from User Settings > API Access in your PagerDuty account

environmentVariables.name: PAGERDUTY_USER_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: PagerDuty User API Token - obtain from User Settings > API Access in your PagerDuty account

environmentVariables.name: PAGERDUTY_API_HOST
environmentVariables.description: PagerDuty API host URL (default: https://api.pagerduty.com, EU: https://api.eu.pagerduty.com)
